Module distort¶

Get DEFORMATION MATRIX for given spacegroup number and Lagranian strain.

Example:

import distort

dist = distort.Distort()                 # generate instance of distortion object
dist.sgn = sgn                           # set spacegroup number (int)
dist.set_strainList()                    # set strain list according to space group number

strainType = next(dist.strainList_iter)  # when using the iterator property --> get first distortion type
dist.eta = eta                           # define lagrangian strain (float)
dist.set_strainType(strainType)          # set strain type (string)
dist.set_defMatrix()                     # ste deformation matrix
dist.get_defMatrix()                     # get deformation matrix
class distort.Distort(volumeconserving=False, mthd='Energy', order=2)¶

Generate DEFORMATION MATRIX for given spacegroup number and Lagranian strain.

Parameters:
  • volumeconserving (bool) – Specify if volumeconserving strains should be applied (default=False) (only for cubic structures) .
  • mthd (str) – Specify method of elastic constants calculation (‘Energy’/’Stress’).
  • order (int) – Specify order of elastic constants.

Dst 01:

\(\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 \end{pmatrix}\) \(\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 \end{pmatrix}\) ============================================================= ============================================================= \(\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 \end{pmatrix}\) \(\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 \end{pmatrix}\) ============================================================= ============================================================= \(\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 \end{pmatrix}\) \(\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 \end{pmatrix}\) ============================================================= =============================================================

\[\begin{split}\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 \end{pmatrix}\end{split}\]

Dst 02: .. math:

\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0  \end{pmatrix}

Dst 03: .. math:

\begin{pmatrix} 0 & 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 \end{pmatrix}

Dst 04:

\[\begin{split}\begin{pmatrix} 0 & 0 & 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 \end{pmatrix}\end{split}\]

Dst 44:

\[\begin{split}\begin{pmatrix} -6 & 3 & -2 & 5 & 4 & -1 \end{pmatrix}\end{split}\]
get_info(v=True)¶

Returns dictionary with object properties

get_strainList_iter()¶

Returns strain list as iterator object.

set_V0(V0)¶

Set equilibrium volume of parent structure.

Parameters:V0 (float) – Equilibrium volume.
set_defMatrix(code, volconserving=False)¶

Calculate deformation matrix. Conversion to Lagrangian strain:

\[\eta = \epsilon + \frac{1}{2} \epsilon \cdot \epsilon\]
set_eta(eta)¶

Set Lagrangian strain.

Parameters:eta (float) – Lagrangian strain value.
set_sgn(sgn)¶

Set spacegroup number.

Parameters:sgn (int) – Space group number of parent crystal structure.
set_strainList()¶

Finds list of deformation types for a specific crystal symmetry

set_strainType(strainType=None)¶

Set current strain (deformation) type.

Parameters:strainType (str) – Set strain type.
